casebody.data:
AMERICAN BENTONITE CORPORATION, O. W. Smith, and J. Benjamin Ott v. CLARK EQUIPMENT CO. and Sialco, Inc. No. 5454. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. April 7, 1930. Chindahl, Parker & Carlson, of Chicago, Ill., and Frank E. Liverance, Jr., of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellants. Knappen, Uhl & Bryant, of Grand Rapids, Mich., and H. M. Huxley, of Chicago, Ill., for appellees.

Before DENISON and HICKS, Circuit Judges, and JONES, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Decree of District Court affirmed.
